CommitComments.CommitComment: Reorganized new jars (common-dbcp, commons-pool) Add DB connection test action (TestConnectAction)
Add TestConnectAction action Reorganized new JARs (commons-dbcp, commons-pool)-> WEB-INF/lib

Added mysql support (mysql-connector-java-5.0.8-bin.jar) 1. Drag and drop jar into project root 2. Configure Build Path 3. Selected the new jar form the availabe jar list -> the jar appears then in the "Libraries" folder with the small yoghurt icon :-)
